title: Aw Shit
lyrics:
24k
Aw shit, you came to the party on that nonsense
Aw shit, why you talkin' if you don't want war, bitch?
My cartridge fill up to the tip, warlord shit
Aw shit, my dick is jammed, I think I need some parchment

Ay, fuck that, we bangin' off wax

You comin' to my city when you leave you getting taxed

Fuck that, bitch I don't play tag

You talking all that la di da di, da di, spray that



Young super soldier walkin' out with super soakers

Like a pool party, we walk up and super soak ya

Greasy with the grease gun, run up with the pole-a

Trappin' off the trap phone, a yellow Motorola



Aw shit, you came to the party on that nonsense

Aw shit, why you talkin' if you don't want war, bitch?

My cartridge fill up to the tip, warlord shit

Aw shit, my dick is jammed, I think I need some parchment

Pull up on a kid

I might pull up at your crib

Pull up on a kid

Tie him up and do a bid

Might shoot up your spot

See the cops and jump the fence

Might shoot up your block

See the opps and let it rip

Face off, hit ten, hide the SK

Splitting both ways like the bitch gay

We spray, we don't catchphrase, we hear the AK

We don't need you livin' anyway 'cause you don't get us paid

Aw shit, why you talkin' if you don't want war, bitch?

My cartridge fill up to the tip, warlord shit

Aw shit, my dick is jammed, I think I need some parchment

Ay, fuck that, we bangin' off wax

Fuck that, bitch I don't play tag

You talking all that la di da di, da di, spray that
